#include <iostream>
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define f first
#define s second
#define mod 1000000007
#define ll long long int
using namespace std;
ll pre[85];
int main()
{
    string x;
    cin>>x;
    int v = x[x.length()-1]-'0';
    if(v&1)
    cout<<"NO\n";
    else
    cout<<"YES\n";
        return 0;
}
